title: Ulta Beauty: Shop Makeup, Skin, Hair & Perfume
description:
Download the mobile app & discover how the possibilities are even more beautiful. Find your favorite makeup, skincare & haircare products—plus play with new looks in the GLAMlab, our virtual beauty try-on experience. Then check your Ultamate Rewards account & redeem points anytime, anywhere. 

- Book an appointment at your nearest Ulta Beauty Salon in a snap! Treat yourself to beauty services for hair, skin & more. 
- Shop by category & filter by brand, price, best sellers & new arrivals.
- Easily find a product using our barcode scanner to view product info, ratings, reviews & save your favorites; QR codes supported.
- Use voice search to search for a brand or product, simply by speaking its name.
- View weekly ads, gifts with purchase & special offers.
- Check out the new & improved GLAMlab! Virtually try on your favorites for eyes, lips & cheeks from top brands including Urban Decay, Anastasia Beverly Hills, Too Faced, NYX, MAC & more. 
- Send eGift Cards or Gift Cards by mail from your mobile device.
- Feel the love! Sign up for Ulta Beauty’s free Ultamate Rewards Program. 
- Access your existing Ultamate Rewards account to view bonus offers, current status & points balance. 
- Learn more & apply for the Ultamate Rewards Credit Card—another exciting way that beauty loves you back! 
- Get the latest skincare tips & trends with our monthly Skin-fatuation feature & haircare tips from our monthly style roundup, Hair Heroes.
- Opt-in for push notifications to be the first to know about exclusive offers on your favorite products & brands, as well as upcoming events at your nearest Ulta Beauty store. 
- Review your Ulta.com account order history and order tracking.
- Use the store locator to get directions to your nearest Ulta Beauty store, view hours & even book a Salon appointment!
- Share your favorite products & looks on your favorite social networks.
- Search for and quickly find recently viewed products using Spotlight Search.

summary: Top brand haircare & fragrance
recentChanges: Fixes to some production bugs for a seamless shopping experience. Enjoy!
comments: So much fun (and so easy!) to find the correct shade of foundation from right here at home! For me, getting the makeup color to match my skin color is a chore! It's always difficult, and that's a shame. Choosing makeup should be fun and indulgent, not a JOB! Ulta has now SOLVED this problem! This app will look at your skin color through your camera, and in a couple of minutes, VOILA! It shows you EXACTLY which shade and undertone you need, in all brands as far as I could tell. SOOOOO useful!

I have ordered several different times with the Ulta app. I absolutely love it. It is easy to use,let's you see how makeup will look on tou,before tou buy it,has quizzes you can take,to figure out what products are best suited for your needs, and you receive points for things that you buy. They also ship quickly.

Works great! Love that I can track my points and see how much I can redeem them for. Only thing is that I wish there was an easier way to add the $3.50 off / 20% off coupons to the check out easier. Something like "activate code" option would be nice, I know they already do this for some other special offers.

Edited 3/21/2020.. Still HORRIBLE and FRUSTRATING!!! I STILL have to create a new password EVERY time I use this App! Every time. Then the App works fine, until I try to sign in again. Edited... Installed the new version of App. I still have to create a new password every time I try to login! Every. Time.

Every time the app is updated I start getting error messages until I install it. Fine, it's still really useful for shopping. But the most recent update is buggy as all get out. It's not rendering a majority of product pages, which is extra frustrating since 21 days is a big buy month for me.

title: IPSY: Makeup, Beauty, and Tips
description:
We’re reinventing the way you discover beauty, making it 100% about YOU. As the leading source of beauty discovery and inspiration, IPSY combines personalized products, content, and shopping (with over 20,000 products!) to create the ultimate beauty experience.

From well-known and well-loved brands like TARTE, BENEFIT COSMETICS, NYX MAKEUP, IT COSMETICS and SMASHBOX to new emerging brands from around the world, IPSY brings you the very best in makeup, skincare, body, fragrance, hair, nails, and beauty tools.
Our mobile app is the best and most convenient way to experience IPSY:
• View your personalized products before they arrive in the mail.
• Choose one of your products and add more to your IPSY Glam Bag, Glam Bag Plus, or Glam Bag Ultimate every month.
• Discover more about your picks and share reviews so your subscription only gets better and better.
• Shop over 20,000+ favorites from top brands at up to 70% off. No coupons, codes, or magic words needed.
• Learn more from thousands of makeup tutorials, face charts, and step-by-step guides—all to help you create endless looks.

Once you’re an ipster, you’re part of something big—a community that’s leaving the rules behind and making beauty a personal journey. And we’ll be with you all the way.

recentChanges:
Bug Fixes
- Links from IPSY emails and push notifications will now open to the correct destination in the app.
- Page loading indicator now consistently shows up.
comments: Love Ipsy and the app is fun and easy to maneuver. My only complaint is that after your bag has been picked, the items show on the home page. I like to be surprised, so it should be optional to see inside your bag. That's why I am giving 4 stars, I feel like that is the WHOLE excitement!

Love, love, Looooove my Ipsy bags!!! I wish I could afford the bigger bags.. but my daughter and I look so forward to our monthly "treats" we both squeal with delight when we see that cute pink package in our mailbox! We've gotten at least 10 people "addicted" to the wonderfulness too! If you're on the fence, Don't hesitate. And be sure to keep your beauty profile updated! Ipsy truly does listen to your likes and dislikes then packs your goodies accordingly!

Easy to use and great interface. You should at least try ipsy once you won't be disappointed. Samples are decent sized and it's worth every penny. Plus it's like a present every month. App is great and definitely better than the website. Recommend to all ipsy members

Ipsy is so fabulous the product are amazing. The site is very user friendly and shopping is easy and safe. I recommend you get Ipsy because it's the best way for get high end makeup, skin care products, and life style ideas. It's the best makeup box app.

I really love this app and I really love the ipsy bags. The app just makes it so much easier to do everything with the bags like get your choice item or look at your monthly bag. It's super easy to use.

title: Sephora - Buy Makeup, Cosmetics, Hair & Skincare
description:
Shop beauty products & earn rewards with Sephora! Try on makeup and discover the best in beauty shopping, skincare, fragrance & more from your favorite brands.

Use digital makeovers to try out the latest styles and looks. Virtual makeup lets you find the perfect foundation, palettes, lipstick and more for your personal style. Buy makeup you love right from the app!

Buy makeup from Tarte Cosmetics to FENTY BEAUTY and Dior. Sephora has the best beauty brands for all your needs. Get makeup tips from our cosmetics experts and seriously glow this season! ✨

Makeup, skincare & beauty products - 5 reasons you’ll love to do your beauty shopping with us:
💫 Virtual makeover: Have a virtual makeover with a few simple taps
💌 Beauty rewards: Join Beauty Insider, our free rewards program!
💅 Hair & nails: Discover nourishing hair masks, everything you need for nails & so much more
💄 Makeup tips: Scan products in-store to receive ratings & product reviews, so check out the hottest brands like Dior, FENTY BEAUTY and Tarte Cosmetics!
😍 Fragrance: Discover seductive or fresh new perfumes from designers, luxury fashion houses & your favorite brands

Go makeup shopping, buy the hottest cosmetic products, start a new skincare routine & find expert beauty products, style advice & tips for your makeup shopping. From hair to makeup, nail art & fragrance - we have your beauty shopping needs covered from head to toe!

Sephora Virtual Artist has professional advice & fresh new makeup tips tailored to your style.

SKINCARE
• Skincare products best suited to your skin type
• Skincare treatment: Protect your skin with the best SPF, or treat acne, dryness & pores with our top-rated products
• Buy skincare brands like Kiehl’s, Dior & many more!

MAKEUP SHOPPING
• Cosmetics, fragrance, hair & nails offers in the palm of your hand
• Buy beauty products from top makeup brands like Tarte Cosmetics, FENTY BEAUTY by Rihanna, Dior & many more!
• Makeup shopping made simple: browse palettes, fragrance mini sizes & value sets to suit your beauty budget shopping
• Makeup tips as if you went to cosmetology school

HAIR PRODUCTS
• Tools to style & treat your hair for effortlessly luscious locks
• Hair spa: Try conditioners & hair masks from bestselling brands like Ouai, Briogeo, Olaplex and many more
• Shop hair care gifts in beautifully packaged sets

FRAGRANCE
• Fragrances for him or her, beautifully packaged and available from Sephora
• Find fragrance favorites or try something new - explore all our fragrance families: floral, fresh, warm & spicy, and earthy & woody

TRY ON MAKEUP
• Virtual makeover on the go: Instantly try on lip, cheek & eye makeup products. Try the Stunna Lip Paint by FENTY BEAUTY, or Tarte Cosmetics' Shape Tape concealer!
• Try on makeup and buy looks created by Sephora experts for your makeover
• Makeover and makeup tips to suit your style from the Virtual Artist

BUY MAKEUP & EARN REWARDS
• Shop with Sephora & earn beauty rewards
• Sephora will send you makeup gifts on your birthday!
• Beauty Rewards Bazaar: Redeem your points on whatever you want

FOUNDATION FINDER
• Beauty comes in many styles - glow, matte, natural finish? Whatever result you are after, you’ll find the perfect product with our simple Foundation Finder.
• Try on makeup and find the product of your dreams in just 2 minutes.

SEPHORA SUBSCRIPTION BOX
• Discover Play! by Sephora, & receive six beauty & makeup samples, a Play! book of tips & tricks, as well as a Play! pass for in-store learning.

HAPPENING@SEPHORA
• Find beauty classes at stores near you, services & announcements.

Get Beauty Insider-only offers, exclusive products, makeup tips, rewards & more. Check Sephora’s sale for a beauty steal, reorder your last purchase or check the stock availability at your local store while on the go.

Book a custom makeover at your local Sephora Beauty Studio, straight from your phone. Download this beauty app now for the best shopping experience.

recentChanges: Bug Fixes and Performance Optimization
comments: I love Sephora and all it has to offer, but I wish the app was a little easier to navigate. It's hard to find their promos. Sometimes things disappear from your cart. And taking the quizzes don't seem to navigate me any further into my products search. That being said no matter what I love Sephora!

Update; I do love this app but I find the constant bugs so frustrating! I, like many others, cannot access the extended product details. Blank screen. It's been like that for days at minimum now. Seems like a big bug to leave unfixed. Love Sephora but I find the app issues & point reward system frustrating & disappointing increasingly frequently. Get it together Sephora!!!! Mostly awesome. The convenience & accessibility of the app makes me buy so much more!

I liked the app. It was pretty well set up. I wouldn't give 5 starts because I have an Beauty insider card for many years from in-store purchases. And now when I finally created my account in the app there is no place to enter my insider card number to view all my points. A little disappointed with that. Now I am not sure how points will be distributed with an app or in store purchases. And if I would lose them or not.

I can't see any product details, how to use and ingredients for any products. Every time I click "read" or "read more", it takes me to a blank page that never loads. Also, the videos for most products don't work. The quizzes are not helpful and, more often than not, there are no results at the end of the quiz which defeats the whole purpose.

App doesnt always expand /load details of products which is annoying. Even the search function isn't great. Navigation could improve slightly. Dont like that when using the website it tries to force me to use the app because I have it installed. If I wanted to use the app I would. Decent app but I rarely search on it. Quick and easy for final payments.

title: SALLY BEAUTY - Shop Hair Color, Hair Care & Beauty
description:
Download the new Sally Beauty app today and unleash your (Pro)tential with the hottest hair, nail and beauty brands. 

Shop. Earn. Redeem. Repeat with the all new Sally Beauty Rewards. From free gifts to special offers, you can easily manage your rewards directly from the app. You’ll also score access to major trend alerts, how-tos and inspiration from our Sally experts. 

Get recommendations on the best hair color and care products to achieve your ultimate hair goals with the Hair Color How-To Quiz. Then use the ColorView feature to try on fresh new shades (makeup, too), so you can color before you commit!

Ready to turn your confidence all the freakin’ way up? Use the store locator to get directions to your nearest Sally Beauty.

recentChanges:
• Bug Fixes and Enhancements
• Loyalty Program Updates
comments: Update 3/6/20. Very annoyed. Reward system is nice, except I can't use my rewards on ANYTHING! Everything I put in my cart, I try to add my reward at the end and it is denied. I'm pretty much over it. I don't have time to call customer service for every transaction. I also feel that I have earned my reward so I should be able to use it on most anything I choose. I did spend the money to EARN that reward! Also having consistency issues with ION color brand.I will be taking my business elsewhere.

Love It... the only frustrating thing I found was that if you dont type "exactly" the product your looking for (Example: ION Demi Permanent Color), the search results pull everything that matches closest to what you did typen so it can be very time consuming. Customer Service was awesome and very friendly once they connected the line. Hold times to speak to someone averages 15+ minutes only downside. Answered all my q's & clarified things I didnt think to ask which was extremely helpful!

Really would like to give 3.5 stars. Not a terrible app, it just Kicks you out of app when you click on certain brands/ items of color , etc. I've deleted and re-downloaded the app multiple times , even while on the phone with customer service, and still had issues while on the phone with them. It just makes the whole ordering process difficult.

Ordering, or even just browsing on this app is always a pain. 8 times out of 10 itll ask me to sign in multiple times, as if I hadnt just signed in when I opened the app, and doesnt let me proceed much further. Everytime I order I have had problems; which seems to continuously result in my calling Sally, Ups, and the postal office in order to track down just one box. Or it just wont even let me place the order to begin with. I love Sally Beauty, but their online set up is absolutely horrible.

App works ok until you place the order. It took me 4 unsuccessful tries before I figured out that I had to also enter a billing address. That was stupid and time consuming. Otherwise I would have rated this app more highly.

title: Booksy - Book Local Beauty Appointments 24/7
description:
Discover and book beauty and wellness appointments whenever, wherever, with Booksy! 

Finding the services you need should be easy, convenient, and intuitive. With our app, filter by location, service type, and date to find exactly what you need. 

Book with hair stylists, barbers, nail or makeup artists, tattooists, estheticians, and  many more. Just find the service you’re looking for, the best professional for the job, a calendar opening that works for you, and hit BOOK! We told you it was easy.

The Booksy Features You’ll Love:
• 24 hour online and in-app booking for businesses near you

comments: Whatever you do, if you make an appointment and leave before the appointment end time, DO NOT CLICK CANCEL. If you do, you'll be charged a cancellation fee. Customer service is horrible, app is buggy. No issues solved when contacted. App overall is great when it works and isnt having issues but that isnt often. Love the overall concept which is why I gave a 3 star review. But for the price it should be flawless. If all my clients didnt switch over to the app already I would've stopped using.

Great idea but app/website difficult use. Emails and txts say appts booked but don't appear in calendar on app. Wanted to cancel appt but link goes to calendar on app where appt doesn't exist. Had to phone barber to try and cancel appt but their end of system down! Website threatens that you will be charged for non attendance when you next go. Unfair if can't cancel and makes you unlikely to return to that supplier. Disappointed.

Best app, its so easy to use and actually really efficient, if you dont know where the barber is, BAM they give you directions, you don't know if it's good, BAM reviews from real people, hate ads, BAM no ads. Overall great app, really recommend it.

Love be the idea but it blocks from booking a service outside of the country where I'm currently in, i.e knowing that in two weeks I will be in a different country and want to book an appointment there. Cannot add another location to the address book :(

title: Scentbird: Online Beauty Shop. Perfume & Cosmetics
description:
Who says you have to settle down with just one scent? Date around before you commit with Scentbird, where you can score a 30-day supply of any of our 500+ fragrances every month for $14.95. Our mobile app brings our catalog of over 500 ​perfumer ​and designer fragrances, luxury skincare, wellness products, and buzzed-about makeup right to your fingertips. Discover new total ​trendy obsessions, manage upcoming orders, and start plotting which items you want to try in the months to follow. Your new favorite product might be one you haven’t met yet.

Scentbird is a completely new way of beauty ​shopping ​that you will love! ​All the​ bare ​necessities in our app. ​The idea is simple, pick and mix as many new scents as you want and try something new every month. Sweet, fruity or fresh? Choose whatever works better each month of the year. Discover body care products,​ beauty supply​, ​luxury​ makeup and more.

Here are a few things our app can do for you:

1. Find new favorites in our catalog of net-a-porter fragrances, skincare, ​minerals​ and makeup, wellness products, which you can filter by brand, category, scent profile or customer rating.

2. Manage your queue by adding or removing products, tracking orders, and get shipping updates.

3. Explore new arrivals, best-sellers, and the Perfume/Cologne of the month.

4. Rate and review past purchases.

Feel like a pop star with our great variety of beauty products. We will make sure your skin is clean and shiny, your scent is unique just like your personality. Fun, feminine and trendy, Scentbird is an opportunity to enjoy and indulge your beauty ​mania​ in a smart way ;)

title: Ice Queen - Dress Up & Makeup
description:
The beautiful ice queen awaits you at her palace for a makeover! Get creative and experiment with icy makeup and fashion.

Features:
❄️ 3 dolls of different races to choose from: Victoria, Aurora and Seraphina
❄️ 3 game levels: spa, makeup salon and dress up
❄️ Elegant hairstyles in various colors
❄️ 12 powers 
❄️ 7 winter pets to choose from: 5 cute snowmen, 1 penguin and 1 baby polar bear

How to play:
❄️ Choose your favorite girl
❄️ Give her a facial at her palace spa
❄️ Apply her makeup at the beauty salon and then choose the best jewelry 
❄️ Dress her up in glittery gowns and capes
❄️ Select matching shoes, a magic wand and shimmery gloves
❄️ Choose her power and which arctic pet should accompany her for the day

Don't miss out on this beautiful dress up game for girls. Download today and you will experience the magic and beauty at the queen's ice kingdom!


By downloading this app you will be able to use some of the makeup and dress up items for free. However, if you wish to use all of the makeover items, you may purchase the Full Version.

title: Mirror Camera  (Mirror + Selfie Camera)
description:
Please watch the teach video to know how to use it.


[   Tommorow, I will meet ... me ... yesterday.   ]


Mirror + Selfie Camera (best mirror app for free)
Let your phone become a perfect smart mirror.

Handy!
Press mirror region to show/hide menu.

[Quick Mirror Camera Guideline]
When application start, it will hide all the menu. So it is really like a mirror.

You can use the following method to change other settings:
1. Press Mirror region to show/hide menu.
2. Drag the red seek bar to change screen brightness.
3. Drag the pink seek bar 1 to change camera exposure. 
4. Drag the pink seek bar 2 to let mirror zoom in/out.
5. Press bulb button enable/disable night mode.
6. Press mirror button to change capture mode. (Capture with "Image on Mirror" or "Your real Image")
7. Press the pause/resume button to pause/resume preview. (freeze image) Then double click the freeze image to let mirror zoom in/out. (Or use two fingers to let mirror zoom in/out)
8. [Volume Key] : Use volume-down key to pause/resume preview. (freeze image) Use volume-up key to do camera capture. You can change other option in the camera settings page.

[Others]
1. You also can take a picture or edit mirror photo image if you wish.
2. Night mode : Press the bulb button, use panel light at the edge of panel.
3. This application will not turn off screen when you use Camera. If user not touch the screen for 10 minutes, this application will auto exit to prevent power loss.

【Recommended External Mirror Image Photo Editor】
( Line Camera )
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=jp.naver.linecamera.android
This APP is now tested more compatible. They support external photo edit more user friendly.

Or you can use system photo editor, it also work. (Test on Samsung Phones.)

【PS】
 Please like us on Facebook. Give us the power of love.
 https://www.facebook.com/jkfantasy

title: Perfect365: One-Tap Makeover
description:
The best FREE virtual makeup app, period. It’s like having a glam squad in your pocket!
 
★ More than 100 million users and counting
★ As seen in The Today Show, ABC News, Allure and Seventeen
 
Try new looks on the fly with the world’s most popular, easiest-to-use virtual makeup app. With new styles created weekly by our expert artist partners and in-house Beauty Squad, we’re the go-to place for selfie, makeup and fashion enthusiasts around the world. Want to try a bold new lip or funky hair color? Get the latest Red Carpet beauty looks? Peek backstage into Fashion Week? It’s all just one tap away. 
 
Key features
 
★ More than 20 makeup and beauty tools so you can customize your personal style – shadows, liners, lipsticks, and more!
★ More than 200 pre-set Hotstyles – one-tap looks!
★ Unlimited custom color options with the Pro Color Palette – design your own look with unique color combos.
★ Video tutorials from your favorite YouTube artists, so you can recreate the virtual looks IRL!
★ Beauty and fashion product recommendations
★ Daily makeup and fashion tips
★ Subtle touchup features for a no-makeup glow
★ Most accurate makeup placement possible with cutting-edge face detection!
★ Save and share your looks via Facebook, Twitter and Instagram
 
The makers behind the makeup magic

Perfect365, Inc. is the global leader in mobile imaging intelligence technology. Built on over twenty years of research and development, we use our world-class Intelligent Imaging™ to enable visual ‘thinking' capabilities in more than 1.5 billion of today’s most popular smartphones.
Website: perfect365.com
Instagram: @perfect365_official
Facebook: www.facebook.com/perfect365 
Twitter: @perfect365

comments: Works great! I really needed a mirror to get a zoomed in look at something but my phone's camera won't zoom in in selfish mode. This worked perfectly for my needs. This is even better than my magnifying mirror at home because I can choose how much magnification I need and I don't need to move my face in a weird angle to see anything.

Pure JUNk Must be spyware that is getting crisp resolution on their end, while end user can't even see a thing. Delete this before you get hacked. Very cloudy, foggy, distorted, shadow-like, image that I can barely make out a silhouette, impossible to determine if I am even looking at a human being, never mind looking at a face in a mirror. This app is either a disgrace, or an absolute joke. Seriously, how do you get away with calling this a mirror? I say again delete before you get hacked!

UPDATE: After using it for a while, I've decided it deserves 5 stars. My phone doesn't have a front flash, but the "mirror" is very bright and easy to see Good app that does what it says. It does get grainy when using magnification, but so do the others I've tried. I'll stick with this app.
This mirror is great! I can quickly and easily check my appearance without having to dig around in my purse! The reflections are sharp and clear! I highly recommend it!

It gives me two error messages due to permission problens when I try to save a photo taken with the app. After allowing the app access to storage it still says "Something went wrong. Try again later". But it's better than no mirror at all.

title: YouCam Nails - Manicure Salon for Custom Nail Art
description:
YouCam Nails manicure salon is the addictive fun new nail art app game that bringing stunning styles to your fingertips! Create nail designs with hundreds of fabulous colors, beauty patterns, and decals. It's manicure magic for girls who love fashion and nail games!

Make up your own unique nail styles or choose from cute one-touch looks. A game for girls to manicure your nails in a fun new way. Now you can experiment with new nail designs quickly and easily without the hassle of nail polish remover.

Love Kylie Jenner's fabulous celebrity manicures? Look like a princess and create your own cute nails!

Try it on for yourself- test out all the features today.

YouCam Nails - Manicure Salon features:

◆ Nail art palette: 65+ colors to paint and draw for one-of-a-kind nail designs just like a coloring book
◆ Say hello to nail designs with 25+ patterns to mix and match, including the classic French manicure, polka dots, kitty, floral, hearts, leopard print, and cartoon characters
◆ Cute polish stickers: 50+ to choose from including jewels, flowers and geometric shapes 
◆ Nail shapes (5 styles) to get you flawless tips
◆ Beauty cam: customize a photo of your nails after you finish your nail designs
◆ Nail makeover in one-touch: Try on 20 complete stylish nail looks expertly designed for instantly glamorous princess hands
◆ Nail polish tutorials and how-to videos for more great nail ideas in Beauty Circle

{How to Use YouCam Nails - Manicure Salon} 

◆ 1. Take a photo & design your own nails 
- Use an existing model’s hand or take a new photo of your own hand
- Adjust the skin tone for more personalization

◆ 2. Polish Your Look 
- Salon makeover tools let you choose any color nails and finish that your heart desires.
- Nails can be designed individually or you can apply one design to them all

◆ 3. Beauty Editor: Customize It 
- Beautify your nails and create a unique manicure by adding stickers or patterns and changing the shape of your tips.
- It's as easy as having a coloring book to create nail designs!

◆ 4. Beauty Camera: Decorate Your Photo 
- Change your background with seasonal, girl style, pretty princess or high fashion background styles
- Stickers and more fun photo effects add to your nail looks

◆ 5. Save & Share It! 
- Cute nails should be shared! Share your nails with friends
- Beauty tips & nail fashion advice can be shared to Beauty Circle and more
- Nail tutorials can be viewed at any time with just one click!

Nail art design is all the fun without the mess of nail polish remover- download the YouCam Nails nail app to become your own nail artist now!

Perfect Corp. would love to hear your suggestions and feedback! Please continue to send questions, suggestions and ideas to: 

YouCamNails_android@perfectcorp.com
Visit us: http://www.perfectcorp.com/youcamnails
Like us: https://www.facebook.com/youcamperfect

DSLR Camera along with high quality Blur effects and light leaks.

title: Barber Chop
description:
There are 11 characters to choose from: 10 adults (4 adult women, 4 adult men, 2 Santa Claus) and 1 teenager. This game is for anybody with a creative mind. It’s also useful as a learning module for current and prospective hair stylists. All you need is your finger and your imagination. Turn on the volume on your device to hear the sound of the tools. You will feel like you’re right there in the barber shop or hair salon.

* The ultimate hair salon and barber shop for men and women.
* Pick a character of your choice.
* Rotate the image to cut and design hair on each side of the head.
* Cut hair with precision using tools such as clippers, scissors, razors and clip guards. The clip guards let you reduce the thickness of the hair, which is a technique known as a fade.
* Create a design and share your work on social media (Facebook, Instagram,Twitter).

Features:
* Selfie-based Haircut: take a selfie, apply hairstyles, then create your own custom selfie haircut!
* Added Design Feeds, check out cool designs by other player!
* Back button to undo the last action you did. As long as your finger stays on the screen, it will count as one action.
* Zooming options for most characters, allowing more accurate cutting.
* Adjustable clip guards to reduce hair thickness.
* Razors for complete hair removal. You can shave the face or head bald.
* Sharing button.
* Music options to listen to while playing.
* Camera button to let you save your work into your photo album,
* Rotation button to rotate the head

Get ready to experience a realistic game that allows you to show off your skills, be creative or become a better barber. There are different ethnicities and genders to choose from. Each character has plenty of hair on their head to give you a limitless number of hairstyles to create. A timer that appears on the screen once you start to play will show you how long it took you to create your hairstyle. It will also be displayed on your saved photo.

You and others will see how skillful you’re getting each time you play. Everything is free!

Website - www.barberchop.com

title: StyleSeat - Book Beauty & Salon Appointments
description:
With over 100 million appointments booked, StyleSeat offers powerful business tools for beauty and barber professionals and it gives clients an easy way to discover and book services like haircuts and makeup online.  

FOR PROFESSIONALS: 

Professionals can organize and manage their business with robust features that allow them to:

- Accept credit card payments 
- Get bookings directly through Instagram  
- Share photos of their best blowouts, braids, makeup, nails and haircuts 
- Manage their calendar, availability, and personal time  
- Require credit cards during booking to protect their business and collect payments when clients no-show or cancel late  
- Send automatic appointment reminders so clients show up to the salon on time 
- Boost business and get more bookings with email marketing and promotions 
- Keep track of important client notes and booking history 
- Block clients that are bad for business 
- Attract new clients to their salon by highlighting their best reviews 

FOR CLIENTS: 

Clients can easily discover and book beauty & barber appointments online. Whether they’re looking for pedicures, lash extensions, weaves, or new hairstyles, StyleSeat offers a convenient way to browse photos and reviews, get important pricing information, and book appointments at time that works for them straight from their professional's calendar. 

- Browse photos of hairstyles and color and find a salon that’s right for you. 
- Never miss a massage with helpful appointment reminders.
- Book recurring appointments with your barber so your haircuts are always on schedule. 
- Realize you need to get your nails or makeup done for a wedding but it’s too late to call your pro? Hop on StyleSeat, find their next opening, and book a manicure.
- Tired of the same hairstyles and nails? Browse the directory and find a stylist that’s a better match.  


WHY STYLESEAT IS A MUST FOR INDEPENDENT PROFESSIONALS: 

On average, stylists waste more than ten hours a week on various tasks. Imagine how many appointments you could fill with those extra ten hours! StyleSeat does the busy work for you so you can focus on delivering great services and getting paid.

- Your service menu is online. Clients can look through your services, read the descriptions, and get pricing information so you can stop wasting time answering inquiries.
- Clients book themselves. You won’t have to schedule a single appointment — no phone calls, texts, or DMs. Once you share your schedule online, clients can find a time that works for them, put a credit card on file, and book an appointment. You get a notification once the appointment is booked and all you have to do is show up and work your magic.
- You get bookings 24/7 Allowing clients to book and reschedule 24/7 means you never miss out on the opportunity for a booking — no more phone tag, no more full inboxes.
- You can easily accept credit cards. Clients put a credit card on file so check out is quick and painless. All they have to do is tip and sign.
- You get detailed reports. See a breakdown of your daily/monthly/yearly sales, deposits, and transactions — no need to manually keep track.
- You can build client relationships and encourage more bookings. Send custom email marketing campaigns, run promotions, and customize each appointment with detailed client notes and booking history. 
- You get paid when clients don’t show up. The average stylist faces 1-2 no-shows a week. For some, that can add up to nearly $5,000 a year. Set up a no-show late cancellation policy and clients will be required to enter a credit card when they book. You choose how strict your policy is and when clients don’t show up, you get paid for your time.
- You can block clients. With the client notes tool, you can track how often clients no-show or show up late. If a client is chronically late, you can block them from booking with you.

- You get bookings 24/7 Allowing clients to book and reschedule 24/7 means you never miss out on the opportunity for a booking — no more phone tag, no more full inboxes.
- You can easily accept credit cards. Clients put a credit card on file so check out is quick and painless. All they have to do is tip and sign.
- You get detailed reports. See a breakdown of your daily/monthly/yearly sales, deposits, and transactions — no need to manually keep track.
- You can build client relationships and encourage more bookings. Send custom email marketing campaigns, run promotions, and customize each appointment with detailed client notes and booking history.
- You get paid when clients don’t show up. The average stylist faces 1-2 no-shows a week. For some, that can add up to nearly $5,000 a year. Set up a no-show late cancellation policy and clients will be required to enter a credit card when they book. You choose how strict your policy is and when clients don’t show up, you get paid for your time.
- You can block clients. With the client notes tool, you can track how often clients no-show or show up late. If a client is chronically late, you can block them from booking with you.
summary: Salon appointment booking and scheduling software for beauty pros and barbers.
comments: It used to be good until they started charging to book an appointment. I still used it regardless, until it applied a $16 tip without my knowledge or approval. To add, my default tip has always been set to "0%", so how does this happen? Then I have to "contact the stylist" per the website, which burns the bridge with that person, asking them to refund a TIP. I'm done using this app, "service" or whatever they want to call it. I'll do walk-ins.

Been using this app for years. No issues until recently where there is now a fee to book appointments. Also, please bring back the "add to calendar button" after the appointment has been booked. Was a nice time saver.

My account has been logging me out multiple times a week & now today I cant log in & the email is all of a sudden invalid although I've been using the same email for years! Since styleseat was free. I'm a stylist and I cant see my appts!
Awesome app! I love the fact that you can essentially tap in to every artist/stylist in your city! Easy to use! Simple! Done!
The app is great for booking appointments with my barber. I'm not thrilled about the booking fee. If I make an appointment, I usually keep it.

title: CosmoProf: Licensed to Create
description:
General Description

The CosmoProf® App is the app for the modern stylist.

Running your business on your phone is now much easier. Specialized menus make taking
payments easy, and you can create a customizable schedule that will sync to your device
calendar. Running out of products? Order, replenish or start a shopping list. Lost your card? No worries,  the app has you covered.  It’s also completely free! Now you can spend more time focusing on your clients, and your #licensedtocreate craft.

Summary of each feature:

Schedule: Make setting up appointments and keeping track of your calendar easy.

Quick Pay with Square™: A POS system at the palm of your hand. Transactions are made easy
through Square™.

Clients: Import clients from your phone’s contacts and calendar. View appointment histories,
save photos and keep track of color formulas.

Inspiration: Access exclusive how-to videos and step-by-steps from your favorite artists and
brands.

Wallet: Download your digital card to your mobile device for easy access on your next store visit.

Messages: Get exclusive offers and coupons from CosmoProf® and your favorite beauty
brands.

Barcode Scanner: Quickly pull up product info, read reviews and add to your shopping list.

recentChanges: Improvements and stability updates.
comments: Horrible mobile experience in app and in browser. Don't bother, use desktop version.
It won't let me log in let alone cancel my subscription very unhappy

I liked the service at first, then I noticed that every month two of the three "options" for boxes were somehow sold out the same day they became available. Also, I needed to put my subscription on hold due to an upcoming military move, and was told I couldn't and would have to put a hold on my mail (moved 7 times...that RARELY works) or remember to swap the upcoming boxes for points instead. 30 days notice that I'm moving across the country. Like I need something else to remember to do?

If you are viewing lists of products and choose one to add to your cart, you cannot return to the last item you viewed and move forward from there. You are taken all the way back to the very beginning. Pretty frustrating 😒. Also if you want to filter or sort the sale items, you can't filter by product category, like lipsticks, for example. You can only sort/filter by BRAND. So you positively HAVE to know what you're filtering for AND who made the items you're looking for. Seems self defeating

Use to be great after 6 months or so I splurged on a 1yr subscription & its slowly declined from there. Each month my box is either less and less to my beauty profile or it's the same kind/shade of samples repeated endlessly & I have updated/altered my beauty profile tons of times to try to avoid this issue but no. Contacted customer care, get promised to correct yet nothings different. I run out of my year soon but no renewing for me. I'll spend that extra @ ipsy which has the same stuff&more

title: TroveSkin: Your Skincare Coach
description:
"TroveSkin is your personal skincare coach"

TroveSkin guides you to improve your skin by providing personalised and convenient access to trustworthy skincare. We give you true confidence by coaching you to look and be your best.

Now with TroveSkin, you can track and analyze your skin changes accurately over time!
✓ Objectively assess your skin changes in response to your lifestyle as well as the skincare products you use.
✓ Detect and analyse your skin issues (spots, pores, texture, fine lines etc) with cutting-edge Artificial Intelligence technology

Start your skincare journey with TroveSkin now!

STEP 1. UNDERSTAND YOUR SKIN, GOALS, LIFESTYLE, AND HABITS 
- Skin analysis: Using cutting-edge Artificial Intelligence technology, TroveSkin helps you understand your skin status by analysing your skin issues such as spots, pores, texture and fine lines. 
- Skin type quiz: Take our skin type quiz in the app to figure out your exact skin type so you can improve on your skincare regime and routine.


STEP 2. LEARN HOW TO IMPROVE YOUR SKIN
-  Discover our content feed: Read personalised articles and skincare tips for your different skin troubles and also catch up on the latest beauty trends!
- Product recommendations: Based on your skin report, TroveSkin gives you a list of recommended skincare products that match your skin type.

STEP 3. GET MOTIVATED! 
- TroveSkin Challenges & TrovePoints, you can get discounts for skincare products on e-commerce sites in your local region.
- Share your results with your friends on social media.

STEP 4. TRACK YOUR SKIN PROGRESS 
- Make it easy to track your skin over time through daily logging and comparing.
- Skin diary: Track the progress of your skin by checking your skin score and skin troubles with TroveSkin regularly. You can even add the skincare products you are using to see if they are working or not! 
- Daily wellbeing log: Track your skincare products, lifestyle, and mood to see how they affect your skin.

▶FOLLOW US ON SOCIAL MEDIA
* Webpage: www.troveskin.com 
* Email: hello@troveskin.com  
* Facebook: www.facebook.com/troveskin
* Instagram: www.instagram.com/troveskin
* Twitter: www.twitter.com/troveskinapp

Hi Trovys!

We’re super excited to finally launch our in-app community in this new release!

Interact and bond with other TroveSkin users, ask and answer questions relating to skincare, share your product reviews, experiences and advice. Because sharing is caring!

In light of the ongoing Covid-19 pandemic, please stay home, maintain your personal hygiene, and wash your hands regularly. Stay safe and healthy everyone, and this too shall pass!
comments: Very good, it has a skin face detecting device.can track your daily progress and your goals. And earn points. Can redeem skincare products. It has a 7 days program Can match points and the onboard camera can tell your skin's health.

it's honestly not bad. the grammar and sentence structure of the articles sound as if the writer isn't as familiar with the English language as a native would be. now, I'm not judging or saying that's bad or anything, only that perhaps an app (such as grammarly) could be used to make the articles, blurbs, and instructions more concise and clear. other than grammar, great app. great concept, great execution, and I'm actually excited to see my progress as time rolls on. thank you!

Nice concept but seems unfinished I don't know whether it's because I live in the UK or something, but the design of the app suggests that it will give skin product recommendations and rewards for collecting 'trove points', but it says there are no products or rewards available. As such, the app functions simply as a skin diary, which is fine if that's all you want. The analysis option also seems pretty hit or miss - it doesn't identify all of my spots, skin texture, lines, etc.

I am really digging the ability to compare my skin from one day to another day to visibly see where there are improvements, where it's worse, and see what needs more attention. Streaks are awesome because it makes me stay on top of my routine. Now, if those Trove points actually were worth something... This would be 5 stars. Overall, I like the app.

I just recently downloaded this app and I really like it yo be honest it gives me the raw truth and also helpful suggestions about my skin but I have to say that the app had not yet recommend products that I can use for my skin type

title: Shopping Fever Mall Girl Cooking Games Supermarket
description:
If you're a true fashionista then start a new shopping adventure & check all the shopping stores in town! If you like fashion games or dress up games, this one combines both! Show off your new style to your girlfriends & try new outfits & accessories with the coco girls! You will start the shopping spree all over the world! From clothes to jewellery and perfumes, you will be able to buy them all with your boyfriends credit card! 

It is a new type & the best time management game in the coco girls games genre! Try all the new fashion trends & get the best sales at the supermarket & cooking shop! You will need to quickly scan the barcodes of the jewellery, clothes, perfumes or make-up and serve your customers the correct items! It is without question the best shopping mall game in 2019! An educational coco game for kids to experience real time shopping of clothing, accessories & shoes while managing cash register in the mall! Become a real supermarket manager and treat your clients well!

Features
- 4 shops with trendy accessories like colorful Shoes and nice sunglasses for fashion games
- Over 200+ mall levels!
- 3 game modes: serve all clients, timed level, scan all items level
- Best Time Management Cash Register simulator! 
- Best educational kids cashier games 2019!
- Awesome Graphics & Sound Effects!
- Upgraded gameplay from our cooking games winners!
- Trendy fashion games clothes and makeover/make-up items!
- Top mall cashier game for kids
- Handle cash counter and customer shopping needs
- Sell dresses, costumes & fashion items to customers.
- Buy dresses, accessories, shoes, jewelry and more in mall
- Get sweet fashion outfits in this girl game
- Loved our cooking games? This genre is very similar, but more challenging!
- Collect cash from customers from your sold items!

The First shop in the mall is the Fashion Shop where you will need to serve your clients with nice necklaces, red dresses & some chich purses! Dress up all your clients otherwise you will lose the level! The women will love this level because of the vivid clothes, but it's also a very good game for kids games!

The Second Shop is the top class jewellery shop where customers come in to purchase the shiniest diamonds and rings in the world! You will serve your clients with diamond rings, perl bracelets and luxurious watches! Forge rings with gems and make them perfect!

The Third Shop is the make up & perfume Store! If you want to enjoy purchasing top items or eyelashes and colorful lipsticks, then this is your shop! Decorate your perfume shop interior with awesome smelling perfume testers, lipsticks & bod lotions! You will have to put the products in some nice boxes so that the users will love their gifts!

The Fourth Shop is the most adored one, it's the Accessories Shop in which girls & women can purchase kitsch products like fake necklaces , perls, diamonds, rings & other jewelleries. You will also find in here some nice earrings, but be careful to serve all your clients!

Play our free supermarket games & download Shopping Fever Mall Girls Games & Fashion Dress Up games today!

Become a real supermarket manager and treat your clients well!

Features
- 4 shops with trendy accessories like colorful Shoes and nice sunglasses for fashion games
- Over 200+ mall levels!
- 3 game modes: serve all clients, timed level, scan all items level
- Best Time Management Cash Register simulator!
- Best educational kids cashier games 2019!
- Awesome Graphics & Sound Effects!
- Upgraded gameplay from our cooking games winners!
- Trendy fashion games clothes and makeover/make-up items!
- Top mall cashier game for kids
- Handle cash counter and customer shopping needs
- Sell dresses, costumes & fashion items to customers.
- Buy dresses, accessories, shoes, jewelry and more in mall
- Get sweet fashion outfits in this girl game
- Loved our cooking games? This genre is very similar, but more challenging!
- Collect cash from customers from your sold items!

The First shop in the mall is the Fashion Shop where you will need to serve your clients with nice necklaces, red dresses & some chich purses! Dress up all your clients otherwise you will lose the level! The women will love this level because of the vivid clothes, but it's also a very good game for kids games!

The Second Shop is the top class jewellery shop where customers come in to purchase the shiniest diamonds and rings in the world! You will serve your clients with diamond rings, perl bracelets and luxurious watches! Forge rings with gems and make them perfect!

The Third Shop is the make up & perfume Store! If you want to enjoy purchasing top items or eyelashes and colorful lipsticks, then this is your shop! Decorate your perfume shop interior with awesome smelling perfume testers, lipsticks & bod lotions! You will have to put the products in some nice boxes so that the users will love their gifts!

The Fourth Shop is the most adored one, it's the Accessories Shop in which girls & women can purchase kitsch products like fake necklaces , perls, diamonds, rings & other jewelleries. You will also find in here some nice earrings, but be careful to serve all your clients!

Play our free supermarket games & download Shopping Fever Mall Girls Games & Fashion Dress Up games today!

title: Emoji 💚 Backgrounds Photo Editor
description:
Emoji background photo editor lets you edit your pictures to make them looks super kawaii and cute with a thousand of emoji (light crown, dog face, heart face, sweet face...) and emoticons (heart emoji, peach and more)
in this app, you can make your picture look cute by adding a sticker emoji, frame emoji, emojis himself, filters and ability to add text.

Emoji Background section: select between more than 50 emoji backgrounds, the best and cute one to add it to your picture and start erasing the unwanted part of emoji background
with Undo and Redo feature you can return to your previous progress without losing it, also you can switch between the size of the eraser tool to erase the emoji background part in a precise manner, with the Unease feature you can redraw the previous emoji background part you have erased it before.


Emoji section: a thousand of emoji and emoticons in this section select your favorite one and drag it everywhere you want.
Emoji Stickers: big collection of emoji & emoticons stickers to customize your emoji background you want.
Emoji Frames: between 10 emoji frame select your favorite one and add it to your emoji wallpapers
Filters: more than 18 filters to customize your emoji background
Text: multiple color & 25 text fonts to customize your text stickers

In the Emoji background Photo editor, we added a wallpapers section it has a thousand of HD & 4K emoji wallpapers & emoji backgrounds to make your phone look great
you can save and set as home screen or look screen any emoji & emoticon wallpapers you like in an easy way.


 Feature of Emoji background sticker: in our app, you will find a lot of features such as big collections of emoji backgrounds as well as hug categories of cute stickers includes all your favorite stickers like vaporwave, emoji, and heart crown sticker, do not forget you can add text as sticker and apply your favorite effect and filter in your photo to make them looks cute

title: Fashion Nail Salon Makeover
descriptionHTML:
👧 Treat yourself to these fancy “nail manicure games”! After a long day at work, there is nothing more relaxing than paying a visit to your favorite nail spa salon. In case you are not in a situation to do so, you can go for the second best thing and that is 💅 Fashion Nail Salon Makeover 💅. Of course we are talking about the best nail art app that allows you to “paint your nails” in the ways that until know you could have only imagined of. Enter our princess beauty salon and make your fashion dreams come true! Other “manicure games for girls” are not even to compare to our fashion nail studio. What makes our makeover salon unique and out of this world is no doubt its rich collection of nail stickers and decals. One more thing that makes our fashion games for girls the best, is its wide range of nail polish colors. Use your imagination in the best way possible! Just an hour of playing our fingernail painting games and you'll be ready to design your own nails like a pro. 👧

💄 Bring out your creativity in the one of the best makeover games for girls!
💄 Choose the skin color you prefer;
💄 Choose one nail colour from more than ten different we are offering you;
💄 Various types of brushes: thin, flat, dotting pen, airbrush...
💄 The largest nail shape collection!
💄 Lots of predefined “nail art designs” to choose and apply;
💄 Sparkling rhinestones in all possible shapes and colors;
💄 All kinds of cute stickers;

💄 Choose a background for your photo;
💄 Choose a hand pose and take a photo;
💄 Share all your cute nail manicures on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter;
💄 Beautiful high quality colorful and attractive graphics!
💄 Infinite gameplay with unlimited combinations!
💄 💅 Fashion Nail Salon Makeover 💅 for girls free!

None of the manicure and pedicure games you've played so far, could have prepared you for this “fashion nail art” step by step studio. All kinds of nail decorations and styles are at your disposal. Making fashion choices can be risky. That's why we've created nail design games that can land you a hand and help you with whatever beauty emergency you're having. You wonder if glow in the dark nails are the right choice for you? Try them out and you'll see! Our virtual nail salon will help you improve your style and inspire others to improve theirs. 👧

👧 Let us help you reach the goal of becoming a beauty queen you've always wanted to be! Step into our “nail makeover salon” and put your artistic skills to use. Painting nails has never been so fun. When you see just how many shades of nail varnish there are you will absolutely freak out. But take a step back and relax! Because whatever nail polish design you chose, you can either complete it with funny stickers or just undo it and select a style that suits you better. The sky is the limit with our 💅 Fashion Nail Salon Makeover 💅! There is no reason for you not to check out our beauty game. If you are more of a toe “nail salon games” girl, we understand. But even then, you have nothing to lose because you would get our stylish games for free. 👧

👧 Take a break from your daily struggles and engage in an adventure called 💅 Fashion Nail Salon Makeover 💅. Your cute nails deserve a special treatment and before they get one, you can give it a go and practice in our beauty salon for girls. After all of the toe nail games you've been through, you are ready for something new. Why not “nail polish games”? We'll tell you why not. Because just with a one click you get to experience glitter nail art or anything else you can think of. 👧

title: Mary Kay® MirrorMe™
description:
Easily create makeup looks you love with Mary Kay Mirror Me™, our new real-time makeover app. Use our new twist on augmented reality to find your most fabulous face from the comfort of your couch or on the go by swiping through countless color combinations on your face, eyes and lips. Mary Kay Mirror Me™ uses your phone’s camera to apply makeup trends and color products the same way they look in real life – no mess made, and no photo upload necessary! 
 
-  Use the front-facing camera to follow your movement and the rear-facing camera on friends to accurately place makeup on eyes, lips and face. 
-  Instantly try on hundreds of Mary Kay® products, shades and specially curated makeup artist looks .
-  Try on makeup looks before meeting with your Independent Beauty Consultant.
-  Share looks that you design or full looks created by Global Beauty Ambassador Luis Casco with friends across social media platforms, email or save to your device for inspiration. Shop as you play by adding the products you love to your marykay.com bag straight from the app.

title: Daily Beauty Care - Skin, Hair, Face, Eyes
description:
“Daily Beauty Care –Skin, Hair, Face, Eyes” is an app that serves as a beauty guide for both
men and women all over the world. Here you will find plethora of natural tips that can help solve
their day to say beauty related problems like acne, pimples, puffy eyes, dandruff, alopecia, dry
hands, greying of hair etc.
You will find remedies for you’re the following problems of hair, face, skin, eyes, hands and feet :
1. Problems of Face: face wrinkles, acne (pimples), fair skin, blackheads, facial hair removal, de-
tanning (removes sun burn), teeth whitening, dark lips, blemishes
2. Problems of Hair: dandruff, silky, shiny & bouncy hair, straight hair, split ends, greying hair,
hair growth (hair fall control), frizzy Hair, head lice, dry and damaged hair,
3. Problems of Skin: glowing skin, uneven skin tone, warts, stretch marks, prickly heat, body
scrubs, body polish
4. Problems of Eyes: dark circles, puffy eyes, beautiful eyes, sunken eyes, better eyebrows,
thicker and longer eyelashes
5. Problems of Hands & feet: dry & rough hands, nail growth, pink shiny nails, dark inner thighs,
dark underarms, dark private parts, cracked heels, dark hands & feet
6. Makeup Hacks: For smudge protection on your lips, For fuller lips, For larger lips (pouty lips),
For long lasting lipstick, Non-transferable peel-off Lipstick, For even coverage of mascara, To
prevent mascara marks, Makeup waterproofing, To prevent staining during nail-paint, For quick
drying of nail-paint, Winged liner, Eyelash curling, For slim straight nose using makeup

So, ‘Daily Beauty Care – Hair, Face, Skin, Eyes’ app is a one stop solution for all your daily care
and beauty related problems where you not just get more than 1000 home remedies for beauty
tips but also get diet tips and exercise plans as well.

Also, you can check your skin type using our newly introduced option – ‘Know your skin Type’
All remedies mentioned in the app are completely natural and uses only your basic kitchen
ingredients like turmeric, lemon, baking powder, ginger, garlic, tulsi, basil, potatoes, tomatoes,
butter, olive oil, vinegar, fruit pulps like papaya, cucumber, banana, apple and others. Also, this
body care and beauty tips app is suitable for all men, women and children of all ages.
DISCLAIMER:
The content and images contained in the app is collected from online sources, we do not claim
the authority of the content
The home made beauty tips information on this app is provided as an information resource only.
Please consult your doctor in case of any health related problem. Pregnant women and children
should consult a doctor prior using these remedies as a precaution measure. XT Apps expressly
disclaims responsibility, and shall have no liability, for any damages, loss, injury, or liability
whatever suffered as a result of your health on the information contained in this app.

title: Mary Kay® SkinSight
description:
Mary Kay® SkinSight™ is a tool for Mary Kay® Independent Beauty Consultants that brings skin care and technology together at their fingertips.
 
With one scan, SkinSight will highlight subtle signs of aging that can be easy to miss.
 
By detecting wrinkles, uneven skin tone and texture, SkinSight will offer product recommendations for each customer. 

Of course, nothing can replace the extensive product knowledge of a Mary Kay® Independent Beauty Consultant. 

Key Features
•	SkinSight™ uses facial skin recommendation technology to evaluate your customer’s skin for personalized Mary Kay® product recommendations. 
•	Compares your customer’s skin against database of over 80,000 facial profiles to recommend the best Mary Kay® product.
•	Provides images that visually indicate what the app has detected for each aspect of your customer’s skin it is highlighting (skin texture, number and depth of wrinkles, skin tone and undereye appearance).
•	Generates product recommendations in order of application which can be shared with customers in person immediately and then sent via text or email.
•	Contains information and benefits for each Mary Kay® product.
•	Helps Mary Kay® Independent Beauty Consultants confidently recommend products to customers.
•	Use the SkinSight™ app to strike up a conversation with a potential customer and generate a booking. Or use it as a hostess perk. You could also entice other guests to book their own parties to be able to receive their own scan. 
•	SkinSight™ can help you boost your skincare sales since it provides comprehensive product recommendations including products your customers may not have thought about trying.  
•	As an Independent Beauty Consultant, this app will help you modernize your business and give you confidence as you recommend products to your customers.
descriptionHTML:
Mary Kay® SkinSight™ is a tool for Mary Kay® Independent Beauty Consultants that brings skin care and technology together at their fingertips.

With one scan, SkinSight will highlight subtle signs of aging that can be easy to miss.

By detecting wrinkles, uneven skin tone and texture, SkinSight will offer product recommendations for each customer.

Of course, nothing can replace the extensive product knowledge of a Mary Kay® Independent Beauty Consultant.

Key Features
• SkinSight™ uses facial skin recommendation technology to evaluate your customer’s skin for personalized Mary Kay® product recommendations.
• Compares your customer’s skin against database of over 80,000 facial profiles to recommend the best Mary Kay® product.
• Provides images that visually indicate what the app has detected for each aspect of your customer’s skin it is highlighting (skin texture, number and depth of wrinkles, skin tone and undereye appearance).
• Generates product recommendations in order of application which can be shared with customers in person immediately and then sent via text or email.
• Contains information and benefits for each Mary Kay® product.
• Helps Mary Kay® Independent Beauty Consultants confidently recommend products to customers.
• Use the SkinSight™ app to strike up a conversation with a potential customer and generate a booking. Or use it as a hostess perk. You could also entice other guests to book their own parties to be able to receive their own scan.
• SkinSight™ can help you boost your skincare sales since it provides comprehensive product recommendations including products your customers may not have thought about trying.
• As an Independent Beauty Consultant, this app will help you modernize your business and give you confidence as you recommend products to your customers.

title: Pixl - Face Tune & Blemish Remover Photo Editor
description:
Get your best look with our new face photo editing app Pixl. The Face Tune & Blemish Remover Photo Editor App.
Want to look sweet and perfect like a model from the cover of a beauty magazine on your profile pictures but a tiny pimple or wrinkle make you complex about that? Dark circles, red eyes, acne and any other blemishes or just bad lighting really messing up an otherwise perfect-for-sharing picture , these all are details that can easily be edited, retouched, fixed, removed and so on. We have the perfect solution for you.

Now you can retouch and tune your photos using our face photo editor that will provide you with numerous tools in order to get the perfect selfie where your skin is perfectly clear, smooth without any acne or pimple without any red eyes, free from wrinkles and dark circles.  Nice & easy to use and it only takes a few minutes to get rid of visible facial flaws for a stunning picture. Our photo editor is a professional beauty laboratory for your facial photos. Remove pimples and wrinkles, outline the eyes, whiten the teeth in seconds and add artistic flair to selfies and portraits with ease, from the convenience of your phone and more than that with all operations made automatically!

BENEFITS you'll get with Pixl app:

Face Editor / Face Tune
Retouch and tune your face portrait in a click and apply impressive filters and photo effects in a way which other viewer will not understood that photo was retouched.

Pimple and Blemish Remover
Say goodbye to pimples and blemishes! We provide you with an advanced and magically blemish remover photo editing tool that works on all skin tones and complexions. With our blemish remover, you can eliminate pimples with the tap of a finger. Add a swipe of blush to add radiance and charm. Unlike other apps, our Blemish Remover tool does not simply 'blur' the target area. Instead, it uses advanced imaging algorithms to blend the source data into the healed area providing seamless, realistic image repairs.

Get a Clear and Perfect Smooth Skin
Improve your skin's appearance with our Skin Smoother tool, make it smooth and clear without any scars, zit or unwanted marks. Retouch, tune, edit and even tan your skin to achieve perfect, glowing perfection in just a few swipes! Your skin will look naturally radiant in all of your selfies and photos!

Acne Remover 
So having a very bad acne days? Acne removal  process has never been easier. With Acne Remover tool give yourself acne and wrinkle-free skin. Pimples, wrinkles, dark circles, dark spots are very easy to remove, just tap on and see the magic with the Acne & Zit Remover tool.

Teeth Whitener
Whitening your teeth takes your smile to the next level! Our teeth whitener function lets you brighten your smile without over-whitening.
- Whiten teeth in new or existing photos on your phone.
- Precise and simple detection of the teeth for whitening simulation.
- Adjustable shade simulation with automatic detection of light environment on your picture.

Red Eye Remover / Corrector
Another tool is going to automatically detect and fix red eyes in your photo as with the help of the latest AI technology and our secret algorithm to achieve super realistic result easily and effortlessly using the most powerful red eye corrector.

Get the perfect tan in your photos
Give yourself a light tan, or a dark glowing tan that looks like you spent the day at an exotic island using the skin tanning tool.
Tanning Photo Editor
• Select areas on your face to tan
• Adjust the skin tan tone level

Reshape
• Instantly slim and change the shape of any part of your face with a couple of simple swipes whether it is about to thin your nose, face shape or to get your lips bigger.
• Make your face thin and skinny with the face slimmer feature

Please feel free to email us for any queries/suggestions/problems or if you just want to say hello. We would love to hear from you.

recentChanges: - Fixed small bugs
comments: App is broken and won't save. Forces you to give good rating. Even after I did, it tried to save a photo but is no where to be found. Developer, you need to stop, let the app save properly, don't force a rating, then let us be happy with the app and rate it. I'm giving a bad rating because the way you have it now doesn't even work! Your own fault.

Maybe I'm used to faceapp/face tune 2 but this is not the "powerful" tool it claims to be. Of the like 6 features it offers they do work well but they are rudimentary features. A refine tool, smoother, whitener does not constitute "powerful"... But again it is a smooth UI and all features work properly so 2 stars but this doesn't rival the programs I already use.

It is just a fast, easy, even fun way to go about improving your smart phone digital photographs, saving and easy, simple organization that saves time. I just felt refreshed and relieved after trying so many that were all just a big waste of time.

Forces you to leave 5 stars or will not let you save your photo. Anything less than 5 stars and they remove the ability to save. App is a 3 star app at best, but 0 stars because of this con. Will be reporting it to Google.
No idea where this app saves images after youre done editing but it OCCASIONALLY saves them in my gallery so it SOMETIMES works. Other than that, its a great app for quick blemish fixes.

title: Mirror Pro 2020
description:
Mirror Pro 2020 is Pocket mirror app providing you an extraordinary and unique experience with HD camera quality which changes your phone environment to Wonderfull HD mirror with extra features. These feature will changes your cell phone to compact mirror, mobile mirror hd and Pocketmirror.

You don’t need to carry Makeup mirror with you anymore. Mirror Pro 2020 has a feature provides you to check your face appearance, look, face makeup, lipstick and hairstyle in just a second. You can freeze the image to check it with Zoom in and Zoom out feature. All this feature make Pocket mirror app as compact mirror. 

Mirror Pro 2020 can save your look for photo editing and can easily provide you service to share it with other apps or can easily share on Social media platforms. Pocket mirror has One touch lightening control feature which helps you to See your self even in darkness. Real time zoom in and zoom out feature will display better view than ordinary mirror. You can even control brightness in mobile mirror which suits you to set you lipstick and hairs. Mirror Pro 2020 provides you quick look of yourself.

Features of Mirror Pro 2020:
- Simple and Easy User interface
- Control Brightness Makeup mirror
- Freeze Image and Download option
- View Rotation (Landscape and Portrait)
- Take Selfie After completing Makeup
- Mirror View, Flip Image view
- Magnifying View and Magnifying mirror
- Amazing tool for daily life for Makeup and Set hairstyle
- Capture image to save it in gallery
- See yourself even in darkness with Lighted mirror
- Professional makeup tool for daily life

How to use Mirror Pro 2020:
After installing Pocket mirror Application, user can use mirror feature of this app in a first tap. User can change brightness of the mirror. You can use Lighted mirror feature in the darkness by using bulb button on screen. Camera button can capture image and save it to the gallery where as user can freeze image to examine it properly by zooming in and zooming out to experience better feature of Magnifying mirror view. Freeze image can be share to other social media platforms and can be download to gallery also. Flip button will show you real mirror view.  

Note: Mirror App using front camera of your device. It requires camera permissions to access camera. The result of Mirror Pro 2020 app is totally depending on your front camera results.

title: Booksy Biz for Scheduling
description:
Join Booksy and try it for FREE!

Booksy Biz is an appointment scheduling app for barbers, stylists, nail techs and all beauty professionals. Booksy Biz helps you master your schedule, take online bookings, and market your services. Get the peace of mind that comes when your booking app becomes your virtual assistant!

What you get with Booksy Biz:

Self Service Client Booking: 24/7 online appointment scheduling lets clients self-book services without calling you. Beauty professionals using Booksy Biz save an average of 12 DAYS A YEAR they used to spend scheduling appointments on the phone!

Calendar Management: Keeping an organized, accurate calendar is easy with Booksy Biz. Our appointment scheduling tools let you know when you’re booked—and when you have open slots to fill. 

Client Management: Having all of your client information organized in your booking app helps you manage and market your business. Keeping records of things like birthdays, booking history, no-shows, and contact information can build deeper client relationships. 

Social Media Integration: Our booking app lets you take appointments directly from your social media, including Instagram and Facebook. Appointment scheduling is even easier when clients can self-book your beauty services on social media. 

Marketing & Loyalty Tools: Engage both existing and potential clients via email, texts, or notifications in our booking app. Automatic reminders take the work out of contacting your clients and help keep your calendar booked. We even offer custom fliers for posting to social.

Business Management Tools: More than just a scheduling app, Booksy Biz is a complete management tool. Generate inventory reports, track commissions, manage your staff, and run your business. Booksy Biz keeps records so accurate you can use them to file your taxes!

Point of Sale: Taking online payments makes checkouts faster and easier than ever. You can also set—and enforce—your cancellation fee in our booking app. In fact, beauty professionals using Booksy reduce their no-shows by an average of 25%!

Booksy Gives You Booking Peace of Mind
 

For more info on our terms, data usage and security, please see our Privacy Policy and Terms of Service https://booksy.com/biz/en-us/privacy-policy-terms-of-use.html

We love feedback! If you have questions, issues, or just ways to make our app and service even better, please contact us at support@booksy.com

title: African Braid Styles
description:
In this African Braid styles App, We have latest and Trending Braids Hairstyles for Black Women.

The crochet braid is always around. Yet, thanks to creative stylist because this choice is re-invented on totally new ways. Those who want to look different with usual hairdo, you can try braid hairstyle for African women in protective and fun touch. However, you have to make sure that the choice that will be achieved on you will be suitable with the types or your hairs and face shapes. You don’t have to worry since there are lots of selections which can fit in you beautifully. 

There are crazy curls as first option which is really easy to transform and maintain. To achieve this African braided hairstyle, you have to plait the cane rows going from forehead back. Sew end of hairs to the head. 

Use the crochet needle for installing the curly weave. Apply the light finishing sprays to hold. This will match suitably to the oval face shape and medium to the long length hairs. It is simple braid hairstyle for black women which can be done only in few minutes about three minutes. 

For African braid styles women they were blessed with textured hair that is strong from one end to another braided black hairstyles easy braided hairstyles.

For most women it’s almost impossible to hold a braid tight to the head but African hair can do that and more! Depending on the hairstyle you are looking for and the shape of your face there are many looks that you can achieve. 

Check out many of the easy braided hairstyles for black women below and choose your own signature style latest african braided black hairstyles.

African Cornrows are much the same with country plaits. It is laid flat on your scalp and follows the shape of your head. The only difference is the process of braiding. Style the bangs as what you desire 1 ½ inch of gold barrels curling irons. Use the finishing sprays for the light holds. 

For executing this looking, you could use the Eco Style brand of gels, sprits, or the others type of sheen. It could suits perfectly for the whole face shapes since this elongates the faces for making it looks slender. It is natural hairstyles for black women.

If You like this App, Kindly give us Rating and Write a Feedback about the app
